item.title: ‚öôÔ∏è PinGod - Machine and Game Configuration
item.description: Machine Configuration PinGod PinGodGame.tscn Scene: Machine Items In the PinGodGame.tscn scenes inspector in Godot you can edit the machines Coils, Switches, Lamps, Leds from the interface but you can just as easily edit this file in text editor and add items there. When the game is loaded the items will be added to the machine. They can be accessed inside the Machine.cs or use the Games helper methods with the item name.

item.title: üè¨ Decals Part 1. Transparent images from Inkscape
item.description: A decal is one way of using images. We’ll create a very rough layout by hand in Inkscape Shot layout Create a shot layout in Scalable Vector Graphics Open a blueprint that was exported from Visual Pinball into Inkscape (not import) Keep the file dimensions when it asks Create bezier lines on a seperate layer for shot angles When happy hide the Blueprint layer Export the image as Page, checking the dimensions are in px and were the same dimesions as the blueprint.
